mapper.insert: insert into ClassTable (c_id, c_name, c_headmaster_name, c_phone, status) values (#{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cHeadmasterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ClassTable set c_name=#{c_name} where c_id=#{c_id}
update ClassTable set status=#{status} where c_id=#{c_id}
mapper.select: select c_id,c_name from ClassTable where status=#{status}
select c_id, c_name, c_headmaster_name, c_phone, status from ClassTable
select * from ClassTable where c_headmaster_name like concat('%',#{c_headmaster_name},'%')
select count(*) from ClassTable where status like concat('%',#{status},'%')
